UltrasonicLocalizer - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
This class uses the ultrasonic sensor as well as falling / rising edge routine to know what is the 0 degrees direction.
UltrasonicLocalizer(Navigation, Odometer, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor, EV3LargeRegulatedMotor) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.UltrasonicLocalizer
The constructor for this class sets the navigation and odometer objects.
ultrasonicMotor - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.CaptureFlag
The pointer to the motor connected to the ultrasonic sensor (to turn it 45 degrees when detecting a flag).
UltrasonicPoller - Class in ca.mcgill.ecse211.project
This class implements the UltrasonicPoller which periodically updates the value of the distance from the wall.
UltrasonicPoller(SampleProvider, float[], UltrasonicLocalizer) - Constructor for class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.UltrasonicPoller
The constructor sets the objects used to updte the sensor's data.
us - Variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.UltrasonicPoller
The sample provider for the ultrasonic sensor.
usData - Variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.UltrasonicPoller
The array that saves the sensor data.
usPort - Static variable in class ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.CaptureFlag
